summary: This is an email from July 2, 2020, discussing the preparation of a detention memo and other legal documents (wheel and unseal motions). The sender is providing a draft document and seeking feedback on formatting, specifically the signature block.
keyFacts: Email dated July 2, 2020, regarding legal document preparation.
Sender is working on a detention memo and mentions 'wheel and unseal' motions.
The sender made CBP a defined term in the document and is unsure how the recipient will want the signature block formatted.
